panels.description: The number of nodes configured in the cluster.
panels.title: # Nodes

panels.description:
The number of unreachable nodes.
Usually because a machine is down or unreachable.
panels.title: Unreachable

panels.description:
The number of joining and leaving nodes.
The number of nodes that are up but not actively part of the cluster, either because they are still joining or because they are leaving.
panels.title: Inactive

targets.expr: (max(scylla_manager_scheduler_run_indicator{type=~"repair",cluster="$cluster"}) or on() vector(0)) + (max(scylla_manager_scheduler_run_indicator{type=~"backup",cluster="$cluster"})*2 or on() vector(0)) + (sum(scylla_manager_server_current_version{}) or on() vector(-1))

(avg(scylla_manager_repair_progress{cluster="$cluster", job="scylla_manager"}) * max(scylla_manager_scheduler_run_indicator{type="repair",cluster="$cluster"})) or on ()  (100*avg(manager:backup_progress{cluster="$cluster"}) * max(scylla_manager_scheduler_run_indicator{type="backup",cluster="$cluster"})) or on () vector(0)
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op=~"$ops"}[$__rate_interval])>0) by (op, le))

panels.description: Total Operations per seconds

targets.expr: (sum(rate(scylla_alternator_operation{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]", op !~"Batch.*"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0))+ on() (sum(rate(scylla_alternator_batch_item_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0))

panels.title: Total Operations/s

panels.description: The percentage of the time during which Scylla utilized the CPU. Note that because Scylla does busy polling for some time before going idle, CPU utilization as seen by the operating system may be much higher. Your system is not yet CPU-bottlenecked until this metric is high.
panels.title: Load

panels.description:
The rate of timeouts (read and write).

Timeouts are an indication of an overloaded system

targets.expr: (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_timeouts{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_read_timeouts{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0))

panels.title: Timeouts

panels.description: Number of Alternator Operations by operation type
panels.title: Operations/s

panels.description: The P95 Latencies per operation

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op=~"$ops"}[$__rate_interval])>0) by (op, le))

panels.title: P95 Latencies

panels.description: The P99 Latencies per operation

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op=~"$ops"}[$__rate_interval])>0) by (op, le))

panels.title: P99 Latencies

value.title: OS Information Dashboard, an Error indicates there are OS related errors

targets.expr: 0*scylla_scylladb_current_version{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"} + on (instance) group_left() (scylla_node_operation_mode{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}!= 3 or on (instance) ((scylla_gossip_live{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}+1<  bool scalar(count(scylla_node_operation_mode{cluster="$cluster"}==3)))*6 + 3))

(min(scylla_streaming_finished_percentage{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}*100) by (instance) < 100) or on (instance)  0*sum(scylla_scylladb_current_version{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}) by (instance)

panels.description: The number of items processed as a result of BatchWriteItem
panels.title: Operations from BatchWriteItem by [[by]]

panels.description: The avarage batch size of BatchWriteItem

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_batch_item_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="BatchWriteItem"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])/$func(rate(scylla_alternator_operation{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="BatchWriteItem"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])

panels.title: Average Batch size of BatchWriteItem by [[by]]

panels.description: The number of items processed as a result of BatchGetItem
panels.title: Operations from BatchGetItem by [[by]]

panels.description: The avarage batch size of BatchGetItem

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_batch_item_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="BatchGetItem"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])/$func(rate(scylla_alternator_operation{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="BatchGetItem"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])

panels.title: Average Batch size of BatchGetItem by [[by]]

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) or on () $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.5", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"} or on () $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) + 1)

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.95", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"} or on() histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], le))

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.99", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"} or on() histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], le))

$func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) or on() $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.5", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"} or on() $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) + 1)

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.95", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"} or on () histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], le))

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.99", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"} or on () histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], le))

panels.description: The number of items deleted by their TTL
panels.title: Expired Item Deleted by [[by]]

panels.description: Number of rows that were read from the cache, without needing to be fetched from storage.
panels.title: Cache Hits

panels.description: Number of rows that were not present in the cache, and had to be fetched from storage.
panels.title: Cache Misses

panels.description: Requests that Scylla tried to write but timed out. Timeouts are counted in the node that received the request (the coordinator), not at the replicas.
panels.title: Write Timeouts/Minutes by [[by]]

panels.description: Requests that Scylla tried to read but timed out. Timeouts are counted in the node that received the request (the coordinator), not at the replicas.
panels.title: Read Timeouts/Minutes by [[by]]
